main event: On 3 April 1960, multiple unidentified objects were observed on the ground in Salem, Arkansas for a duration of 20 seconds.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 20 seconds,Locations reported bright lights or objects in the sky beginning 9 April 1960, Radar detection confirmed multiple unidentified objects in the area, Aluminum foil strips were found in the field but could not be located later, A response letter referred to training exercises involving aluminum foil.
witness description: Various people in the area reported seeing the objects.
